title: Nannyâ€™s Braised Steak
directions: Add mustard and sugar to a freezer bag
Add raw steaks to this bag and toss and rub around to coat the steaks with the mustard/sugar mix
In a second freezer bag add flour and season with salt and pepper
Tip steak from the first bag into the second flour bag and toss around to dust them with the flour mix
Remove steaks from bag and lay them in slow cooker (single file if you are able to)
Combine the sauces and pour over the steaks
ingredients: 1kg Oyster Blade steak (or any affordable casserole style steak)
3 tablespoons of creamy bottle style mild American mustard
1/2 cup of tomato sauce/ketchup (I used low sugar but you can use regular)
1/8 cup of soy sauce (I use reduced salt but you can use regular)
